entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is mentioned as the new Gryffindor Keeper and brother of Beaters Fred and George. He is also described as a promising new talent on the team.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of Weasley's brothers who are Beaters.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of Weasley's brothers who are Beaters.

entities.name: lee
entities.description: Lee is mentioned as the voice that announces the Slytherin score and cheers for his team.

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is mentioned as a Gryffindor player who is tanking up the pitch.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is mentioned as screaming at Harry for unknown reasons.

relationships.description: Lee is a member of the Slytherin team.
Katie Bell is a member of the Gryffindor team.
